mapper.select:
SELECT r.userId, r.spaceId,r.reservationDate, r.startTime , r.endTime, r.purpose, r.memo, r.regdate,s.name as spaceName, u.name as person, u.email as email, u.phone as phone FROM hguclub.reservationInfo as r
LEFT OUTER JOIN hguclub.user as u ON r.userId = u.id RIGHT OUTER JOIN hguclub.space as s ON r.spaceId = s.id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hguclub.reservationInfo (userId, spaceId, startTime, endTime, purpose, reservationDate) VALUES (#{userId}, #{spaceId}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{purpose},#{reservationDate});
